metadata.title: Vectors of Desire — Transformation and Aftermath
metadata.summary: Entries for spirits sought to reshape desire, rewrite personal trajectories, or stabilize volatile inspiration once a rite concludes.

body: Turn to this section when managing hearts, inspiration, or mutable substance: each spirit warps appetite or identity until properly channeled.

Lilith — Purpose: Awaken autonomous desire and challenge complacent bonds. Manifestation: night sovereign woven from shadow and moonlit glass. Favours: silvered mirrors left beneath starlight. Wards: knot red thread around bedposts and declare ownership of shared spaces before midnight.

Sitri — Purpose: Force confessions of love or lust to fracture alliances. Manifestation: leopard-headed prince whose laughter steals restraint. Favours: copper bracelets warmed against the heart before negotiation. Wards: pair cold iron rings and hide them in opposite corners to absorb his heat.

Phenex — Purpose: Ignite artistic or doctrinal fervor that binds audiences. Manifestation: radiant phoenix singing verses that compel obedience. Favours: laurel wreaths kept from direct flame and sheet music inked in gold. Wards: answer his melodies with collective humming to disperse enchantment.

Zagan — Purpose: Transmute liquor, metals, or reputations to feign sobriety and wealth. Manifestation: griffin-winged bull bearing alchemical retorts. Favours: decanters of aged spirits and scales balanced with unfamiliar coins. Wards: store ceremonial drink in sealed clay vessels; audit ledgers hourly to reveal false riches.

Orias — Purpose: Realign social standing and ambition through precise planetary timing. Manifestation: lion with serpent tail riding a vaporous horse, tracing star maps midair. Favours: brass armillary spheres anointed with aromatic oils. Wards: misalign seating at councils and rotate gatherings between dawn and dusk so his geometries cannot settle.
